message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $120. I think it would be very valuable to you!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. I am willing to pay $95 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $95 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $100 for the product.
